title: fix: image model optimizations for stability and quality
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Tuning the dream engine
gist.blurb: We've given our image models a tune-up! Flux is feeling more stable, Sana is painting with more detail, and Twinflow is sprinting faster than ever.
gist.summary: Optimized Flux Klein for memory stability, increased generation steps for Sana to improve quality, and adjusted Twinflow for faster performance.
gist.impact: Users will experience significantly fewer generation failures and higher visual quality across these models.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a mechanic or engineer, fine-tuning a complex piece of retro-futuristic machinery (representing the image generation backend). The machine is glowing, indicating it's working better.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot wearing a tiny mechanic's cap, fine-tuning a glowing holographic image projector. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. No text. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
